titleStmt.title: The credibility of the Christian revelation, from it's intrinsick evidence in eight sermons, preach'd in the Cathedral Church of St. Paul : being the lecture for the year 1699, founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. : with a ninth sermon, as an appendix, in reply to an objection / by Samuel Bradford ...
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
